entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
